latestVersion.termsOfAccess:
Project files like raw data, coding guidelines and questionnaires can now be directly downloaded from this site.
Please see also SSD's Farm Household Survey Database (http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/).
latestVersion.dataAccessPlace: All files for this project/study, except for the Project Description, need to be directly downloaded from SSD's Farm Household Survey Database's online link: http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/

fields.value: Social Capital Assessment Tool (SCAT) Household Survey

dsDescriptionValue.value: The data were used to show evidences on the extent of farmer participation in organizations and collective maintenance, based on performance of Balanac River Irrigation System Irrigators' Association (BRISIA), a local organization within the Balanac Irrigation System. It examined the links between the physical and socioeconomic environment and the strength of farmer involvement, to identify the conditions under which farmers are most likely to participate in irrigation system management.

keywordValue.value: SCAT household survey includes on structural social capital and cognitive social capital. Structural social capital part is composed of various aspects of structural social capital such as organizational density and characteristics, networks and mutual support organizations, exclusion, collective action, and conflict resolution. Cognitive social capital section presents items relating to several aspects of cognitive social capital including solidarity, reciprocity and cooperation.

fields.value: Subject: Members of the association  Type: Sample Size  Notes: 218;
